oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bob Rieley Collection - tape 7
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 7 of various performances featuring Chubby Wise (performer), Roy Acuff (performer), Bill Monroe (performer), Curly Fox (performer), Eddy Arnold (performer), Mac McGar (performer), Tommy Magness (performer), and Earl Scruggs (performer), in 1947 and other unidentified dates. Some recordings from an American Ace sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chubby Wise; Roy Acuff; Bill Monroe; Curly Fox; Eddy Arnold; Mac McGar; Tommy Magness; Earl Scruggs;
